description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Veks and Silence is an action packed 2D side-scrolling zombie shooting adventure!  Take control of "Silence" in his quest to destroy hordes of zombies and other  undead creatures on an adventure that spans 13 levels. This incredible game  contains a variety of fun weapons and features beautiful 3D graphics.
